results.name: Triangle read by rows, A127446 * A000012, 1<=k<=n.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A127446 * A000012, 1<=k<=n. Given triangle A127446, partial sums of terms starting from the right.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Row 4 = (12, 8, 4, 4) since row 4 of triangle A127446 = (4, 4, 0, 4).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 06 2008
